海领国际工程机械交易中心

Key business circulation projects in Chongqing / key projects of Chongqing bonded port area

项目总投资逾6亿元，总占地约200亩，总建筑面积约15万平方米。
项目由4 (6) S店区、整机及配件交易区、进出口整机及配件交易区、设备维修区、露天展示区、综合商务楼六大功能区组成。
自2015年10月30日投入试运营以来，历经两年的市场培育，已有百余商户入驻经营, 年交易额约30亿元。形成集工程机械整机、配件、二手机销售、维修、仓储、技术培训、综合配套服务等功能于一体，以互联网创新思维为工程机械商户量身打造更为专业的工程机械贸易服务平台。
With a total investment of over 600 million yuan, a total area of about 200 acres and a total construction area of about 150,000 square meters.
The project consists of six functional areas like 4 (6) S shop area, complete machine and accessories trading areas, import and export complete machine and accessories trading area, equipment maintenance area, open-air display area and comprehensive business buildings, etc.
Since it was put into trial operation on October 30, 2015, after two years of market cultivation, more than 100 merchants have settled in, and the annual transaction volume is about 3 billion yuan. It has integrated engineering machinery complete machine, accessories, second-hand machine sales, maintenance, warehousing, technical training, comprehensive supporting services and other functions, and built a more professional engineering machinery trade service platform for engineering machinery merchants with Internet innovative thinking.

入驻品牌
